item.title: "deposit inventory" button causes massive lag! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:4, topic:422310”] case 89223: for (int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) { for (int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995)) { c.getItems().bankItem(995, invSlot, 2147000000); } c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 20); c.sendMessage("If all of your items did not bank it is to prevent lag; you can only bank twenty of one item at a time."); } } break;

If that does not work, I’ll try something else.[/quote]
ok trying it thanks for the help btw and you sir are rep++

Read full topic

item.title: "deposit inventory" button causes massive lag! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

case 89223:
    for (int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) {
        for (int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) {
            if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995)) {
                c.getItems().bankItem(995, invSlot, 2147000000);
            }
            c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 20);
            c.sendMessage("If all of your items did not bank it is to prevent lag; you can only bank twenty of one item at a time.");
        }
    }
    break;

If that does not work, I’ll try something else.

Read full topic

item.title: "deposit inventory" button causes massive lag! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

hey guys i have a deposit all button interface in my bank but everytime someone clicks it it causes their client to lag from 20 to 30 seconds so i was wondering if anyone could help me with this heres my deposit inventory snippent:

case 89223: //Deposit Inventory for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) { for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) { c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000); } } break;
